title: Green Tea Layer Cake
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '150g cake flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 teaspoons powdered green tea', '250g caster sugar', '250ml vegetable oil', '3 eggs', '200g natural yoghurt', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'Green tea icing', '150g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons powdered green tea', '30g butter, softened', '85g cream cheese, softened', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 1/2 teaspoons milk']
